name: Lucky 13 (0x746564)
description:
A version of Baroness Solitaire for the GitHub Game Off Jam.

Match cards based on their face value to create pairs of 13.  If you play your cards right, you might not have to rely on the luck of the draw!

HOW TO PLAY
The goal of Lucky 13 is to match cards in pairs that add up to 13 based on their face value.

In the image below, you would match the Queen with an Ace, because Queen = 12 and Ace = 1.

Cards are dealt five (5) at a time.  To match cards, click on a card to highlight it, then click on the card you want to pair with to move both cards to the wastepile.

When there are no matches left, click on the deck to deal five (5) new cards.

Cards can be moved to an empty tableau space.  In the image below, you can move the selected Ace to the empty space to free up the 9 to be matched with the 4.

Kings are worth 13 and don't need to be matched with another card.

Seven (7) cards are dealt for the last deal, with two (2) of them going into the overflow tableaus in the lower left-hand corner.  These cards can either be matched with each other, or matched with cards in the other tableaus.
